system.description: • -1 diff to Charisma, Appearance rolls when interacting with mortals.
• -1 diff to Leadership, Intimidation, Empathy rolls.
• -2 diff to Manipulation rolls.

• Can see magic, see auras of intelligent beings, recognize bounds of persistent spells, etc.
  • Lose normal sight, can only see areas illuminated by beings' auras, including own aura.
  • Auras come from all animals/insects/magically-sentient-constructs, people aura avg as torch.
  • Exalts aura as bonfire, demons stronger than avg human, humans can be as dim as candle.
• With gun, arrow, or dart, no penalty to specific targeting, -1 diff if general targeting.

• -2 diff to intimidation, subterfuge, & resistance to intimidation rolls.
  • +2 diff to others' attempts to get under your skin or read your responses.

• People trust you even if not trustworthy, & tend to think of you as some sort of paragon.
  • When you get in trouble, authorities will go easy & even strangers will come to your defense.

• +3 dice to all rolls involving Etiquette, Manipulation, Leadership, Subterfuge.
  • If your true intentions eventually become clear, nobody will trust you.
• Banner flares when and only when you want it to. Can flare as torch or bonfire brightness.
• Unless specifically say I'm dressing for mobility/combat, +2 diff to Athletics.
• Increase wound penalties by 1 when injured.
• Herbivores shy away, carnivores see you as potential threat. May not possess Animal Ken.
• Vestigal wings, +1 diff Dexterity when not free.

• Reflexively spend 1 Ess & choose an ability, for (Ess+1) turns in combat, or mins out of it, add (attr being rolled + ability chosen) dice to all rolls using the Ability.
  • Available abilities: All marked as Key.

• Spend a turn examining target, spend 1 Ess & roll Perception + Empathy vs diff of target's (Wits + Subterfuge). Success reveals deed in all target's history they're most ashamed of.
  • With 3+ successes, learn some specific details (names, dates, things might have seen if were present). With 5+, learn more than target knows, such as long-term consequences.

• -1 diff to Manipulation rolls. +1 diff all rolls in dense crowds (80% stadium capacity, have to speak loud to be heard, no elbow room, etc. Proximity matters, addressing crowd from a point with elbow room doesn't count).
  • Can see in the dark. With Arcane Eye, Auras shine twice as far in the dark.

You are set apart from others - it is your place to speak in private confidence to those worthy of your time, and it is your place to command the rabble, but you should not sully yourself by acting as a member of that very rabble - first among equals will never apply to you because you have no equals.

• Never need to sleep, nor suffer sleep deprivation.
  • If sleep, suffer nightmares, and roll WP diff 7 upon waking to regain WP.

• Select a Demonic Aspect (not Hardened Devil Body). Chosen: Flight, Transcendent Anathema.
  • Concentrate for action & roll Ess diff 7, or reflexively spend 1 Ess, to manifest Aspect(s).
  • Can manifest any/all chosen Aspects this way, all auto-manifest when banner flares.
  • To not manifest with banner, must roll WP diff 7.
  • Can purchase Ess Rating times. Aspects don't have to match ones in Shintai form.

• Spend 1 Ess & roll Charisma + Etiquette, diff 4, effect lasts for rest of scene.
  • Anyone without WP > successes can't notice you unless directly interact with them.
  • If take indirect action that would cause distress, and char has 5+ WP, they can spend 1 WP & roll WP diff 7 to be able to acknowledge/confront you.
Diff = target's (Wits + Subterfuge) rating.
Diff 4.

• 1/scene, regain 2 Essence when forcing enemy or powerful figure to submit to my will.
  • Regain (3 + Essence Rating) Essence when the sun rises.
  • If beginning a scene at 0 Essence, gain 1 Essence.
  • Regain 1 Essence every 15 mins in a Node, & every 3 hours in the Spirit World.

• When intensely studying object, individual, or situation, spend 1 Esssence to ask a question.
  • GM must answer honestly, but can only ask question ever once per obj/indiv/situ.
  • When anima flaring, great eyes open within golden smoke of bannner, and become impossible to ambush or strike unexpectedly, including verbally, even if foe is invisible.

• Permanent manifestation of one demonic Aspect: Camoflauge.
  • Guide grants advice, free Occult specialty in single Hell-like domain of Vort.
  • +2 dice to social interactions with Banes or denizens of Hell-like realms.
  • -2 diff to Awareness.
  • +2 to Initiative results.

• Limit Track runs 0 to 10, +1 Limit when you: Botch a roll, act to undermine/betray Nature or Intimacies, or whenever someone tries to exercise power/authority over you.
  • At 10, enter Torment and reset Limit. When in Torment, Nature changes to new Archetype, lasts from few hours to 2-3 days, burns out faster by committing regrettable acts.
  • Archetypes:
    • Destroyer: Regain WP when destroy something precious/useful, like artifact or relationshp.
    • Enslaver: Regain WP when subvert another's will to your own.
    • Sadist: Regain WP when deliberately cause great pain (physical/emotional/spiritual).
    • Tyrant: Regain WP when utterly destroy/ruin someone who opposes you.
    • Vivisectionist: Regain WP when your twisted experiments yield useful information.

• First time in story you transform, one turn, 2 Ess & 2 WP. Future attempts require roll Ess at diff 6, +1 diff each afterwards. If already diff 9, instead +1 Ess & +1 WP. Cost resets each story, or if spend 28 days without use.
  • Normal health track, damage does not carry between normal and Shintai forms. No KO, if Incap by lethal/agg, form shatters and you take 5 unsoakable bashing.
  • Lasts 1 scene. Cannot resume Shintai from in same scene it was destroyed or dismissed.
  • Houserule: 1 shintai aspect = 2 apocalypse form points
  • Shintai Form:
    • +1 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +1 Stamina
    • +3 Charisma, +3 Manipulation, +3 Appearance
    • +1 Perception, +1 Intelligence, +2 Wits
    • -2 diff Leadership
    • -2 diff Subterfuge
    • (Final movement speed: 8w/21j/47r)

• Permanently triple base movement speed.
  • Permanently double all initiative results.
  • Each minute of flat-out movement adds 1 to speed multiplier, max x10 after 7 minutes.
• Mol-Garathi

• Spend 2 Ess & roll Manipulation + Subterfuge, diff of target's WP.
  • All who hear target view their words as suspicious, untrustworthy, unpleasant.

• Gain intuition of common societal/religious laws of any people I walk among.
  • No discrete information, but no penalty for being unaccustomed to local practices.
  • 1/session, if use/manipulate/apply knowledge of the law for significant steps towards a goal, regain WP as if affirm intimacy.

headers.touchstones:
Intimacies:
Â· Principle: I have no equals.
Â· Tie: Dr. Woebegone (presence reminds me of my own weakness).
Â· Tie: Rahmiel (desire to rip him away from Smithy and subjugate him).
Â· [Fake] Tie: Sarah Smith, "Smithy" (comfort, cameraderie).
